title: Mushrooms: the definitive guide
description:
Our writers dig into the world of mushrooms.

  • Porcini - These mushrooms are fantastic in pasta dishes
  • Chanterelle - These mushrooms are a perfect addition to soups

title: New burger restaurant opens downtown
description: The newest restaurant in town is a hit with our team of burger lovers.
review:
We reviewed the restaurant on a quiet Wednesday afternoon.

Food

The burgers were grilled to perfection.

Value

The value could not be better.

title: Shortage of ice cream causes panic across the city
description:
Reports of panic buying as production hits yearly low. A Police Department spokesperson commented:

Everyone needs to chill

For a great alternative to ice cream, see Make the perfect carrot cake.

title: Make the perfect carrot cake
description: This carrot cake is a true classic.
method:
1. Grate the carrots
  2. Mix all the ingredients
  3. Bake in a cake tin for 1 hour

title: How strawberries will transform the way you eat breakfast
description:
Strawberries are an excellent source of Vitamin C. Here are some great ways to give your morning meal a boost.

  • Add strawberries to your cereal
  • Top off your pancakes with strawberries
sponsorship: This content was sponsored by the Strawberries Are Great corporation.
